atk-vin02a13:1: 655. Adhikaraṇasamathesu – sattāti tesaṁ dhammānaṁ saṅkhyāparicchedo. Catubbidhaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ samenti vūpasamentīti adhikaraṇasamathā. Tesaṁ vitthāro khandhake ca parivāre ca vutto, tassatthaṁ tattheva vaṇṇayissāma. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a13:6: Ciraṁ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, kāle vassaṁ ciraṁ pajaṁ;
atk-vin02a13:7: Tappetu devo dhammena, rājā rakkhatu medaninti.
